overview: Ten years ago, Zhang Yifan, the captain of the rescue team, took his family to the beach for a holiday. Unexpectedly, a typhoon broke out. On the way back, he encountered a car accident. Zhang Yifan tried his best to rescue the injured, and did not want his son Zhang Yitian to be accidentally killed by a landslide. Over the past ten years, Zhang Yifan, who was deeply remorseful, was depressed, quit his job as a rescue team, and opened a car repair shop. Son's death made him nervous....
title: Typhoon
